configs.name: personalDNSfilter
configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"personalDNSfilter is a DNS filter proxy that hooks into the domain name resolution and returns the loopback address for filtered hosts.","appName":"personalDNSfilter","customLinkFilterRegex":"^DOWNLOAD\\s+APK$","filterByLinkText":true,"supportFixedAPKURL":true,"trackOnly":false,"useVersionCodeAsOSVersion":false,"versionDetection":true,"versionExtractWholePage":true,"versionExtractionRegEx":"(?<=^|[,.\\s])(?:C|c)urrent\\s+(?:V|v)ersion\\s+is\\s+((?:[0-9]+\\.)+[0-9]+)(?=[,.\\s]|$)"}

configs.author: Zens Solutions
configs.name: personalDNSfilter
configs.additionalSettings: {"about":"personalDNSfilter is a DNS filter proxy that hooks into the domain name resolution and returns the loopback address for filtered hosts.","appName":"personalDNSfilter","autoApkFilterByArch":true,"trackOnly":false}

description.en: personalDNSfilter is a DNS filter proxy that hooks into the domain name resolution and returns the loopback address for filtered hosts.
